channel.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError?
channel.description:
My server was running fine and everything and then I added a shop, and it compiled fine and everything.. but then when i went to run it again, it gave this error.. can somebody help? I tried taking the shops back out.. i erased everything that i had done..
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "7453 100" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:146) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:71) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s something wrong with this section:
7453 100
What ever it is. You may have too many items in the shop…

Read full topic

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError?
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

there’s no spaces at all, i just checked everything that I added in

Read full topic

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

There is a space somewhere in your shops config. Make sure you using tabbing.

Read full topic
